questions.question: Write method with one argument, which you need to use to get the 2D drawing context for drawing 2D graphics on canvas
How do you call a function named 'myFunction'?
Which code block would allow for a color change of the outline shape or line to green.
Which code block allows the programmer to draw various shapes and lines on to the canvas?
What is Canvas?

answers.a: Canvas is a CSS property, with which you can choose the shape type.
answers.b: Canvas is a HTML Tag which is used to include an image within a webpage or website
answers.c: Canvas is an XML-based vector image format for defining two-dimensional graphics, having support for interactivity and animation
answers.d: Canvas in a HTML 5 element that is used to draw graphics and different types of shapes by using JavaScript.

questions.question: How do you round the number 9.25, to the nearest integer?

Is it possible to get the content of a comment from JavaScript?

answers.a: Yes, the comment is a DOM node, you can get it
answers.b: No, comments are in the HTML but not in the DOM
answers.c: You can get it, but only until the page is loaded
answers.d: Yes, you can do it with getComment() method

questions.question: What is the difference between confirm and prompt dialog box?

tasks.sentence: confirm(): Display a popup box with
answers: a question and two buttons: OK and Cancel
the specified message and waits for the user to press OK.
a text message, an input field for the visitor, and the buttons OK/Cancel
tasks.correctAnswer: a question and two buttons: OK and Cancel

tasks.sentence: prompt(): Display a popup box with
answers: a question and two buttons: OK and Cancel
the specified message and waits for the user to press 'OK'.
a text message, an input field for the visitor, and the buttons OK/Cancel
tasks.correctAnswer: a text message, an input field for the visitor, and the buttons OK/Cancel

questions.question: Match definition and meaning
answers: Represents the intentional absence of any object value
A data type whose variable is not initialized
Data type which contain key-value pairs of collection of data

correctAnswers.undefined: A data type whose variable is not initialized
correctAnswers.null: Represents the intentional absence of any object value
correctAnswers.Object: Data type which contain key-value pairs of collection of data

questions.question: Match definition and meaning
answers: Data type whose instances are unique and immutable
Primitive data types that have one of two possible values. This values are usually used for conditional operations
Data type which represents textual data

correctAnswers.Symbol: Data type whose instances are unique and immutable
correctAnswers.String: Data type which represents textual data
correctAnswers.Boolean: Primitive data types that have one of two possible values. This values are usually used for conditional operations
